-- foo/foo.ts --
import { api, Query } from "encore.dev/api";

interface StringOps {
  eq?: string | string[] | null;
  gt?: string | null;
  lt?: string | null;
}

interface Params {
  where?: Query<Where>;
}

interface Where {
  and?: Where[];
  or?: Where[];
  created_at?: StringOps;
  revoked_at?: StringOps;
}

export const test = api<Params, void>({}, () => {});

-- package.json --
{
  "name": "foo",
  "type": "module",
  "dependencies": {
    "encore.dev": "^1.35.0"
  }
}
